title: Gravity Gaming Summoner Icon?
body:
There doesn't seem to be a summoner icon for gravity gaming in the store. Is there are certain reason for this? 

I just like to be able to buy the icons of the teams I support each season.

Thanks for any replies.

replies.body:
Hey SolidSolomon,

There is no Gravity Icon in the bundle at this stage. Once we have one to release it will be updated.
